original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: Tulsi Gabbard, the Director of National Intelligence, claims that the Obama administration falsely accused Donald Trump of colluding with Russia to delegitimize his 2016 election win. She alleges that Obama ordered intelligence officials to create a politicized assessment suggesting Russia favored Trump over Hillary Clinton, a claim Gabbard says is false.</s>
